sect1.title: Invalid authentication
sect1.para: This screen appears when the username or the password is invalid. This error message can also appear in case of an invalid user.
Solution : check both username and password.

sect1.title: You do not have access to this function
sect1.para: This screen appears when a user attempts to access a function for which he/she does not have the proper access privileges. This error message can also appear when the session was terminated by the application (session timeout), a reconnection is then necessary.

Solution : go back to the home page and reconnect. Check the user's access privileges to the various functions of the application in Administration > Users. For more information, consult the PMB Administrator's Guide.

figure.title: You do not have access to this function

sect1.title: No open session
sect1.para: This screen appears when a user attempts to access a PMB tab directly via its address : pmb/circ.php ; pmb/catalog.php... while he or she is not connected.
Solution : click on OK and enter a valid username and password.
